item.title: Karush-Kuhn-Tucker Condition

ewcommand{\Mee}[9]{ egin{bmatrix} #1 & #2 & #3  r #4 & #5 & #6  r #7 & #8 & #9 \end{bmatrix}}$ Definition: Problems With Equality and Inequality Constraints $$ egin{align*} &	ext{minimize }& f( {x})  r &	ext{subject to }&  {h}( {x}) =  {0} r &&  {g}( {x}) \leq  {0} \end{align*}$$
